A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Thank you Rian\, for making this not a Star Wars movie but a Star Wars movie. Everyone’s mad that they didn’t get the answers they wanted and that it’s not like the past trilogies. That’s what makes it amazing. ITS A NEW STORY\, HE SAID ITS NOT GONNA GO THE WAY YOU THINK SO STOP BEING BUTTHURT. You have a movie that portrays animal cruelty\, slavery\, weapon trafficking among two sides\, and war\, still being a Star Wars movie. It’s a masterpiece. I have faith the IX is only gonna make it better. This is just setting up the truth\, and that is Kill the past. Star Wars is changed forever. It’s literally the opposite of Empire Strikes Back and that’s why I love it. Rian you’re the goat. You saved this franchise and now get to make a new trilogy. Cant wait. 100/10 for you.
